text:
A ground-penetrating radar survey in 2018 found a 20-meter Viking ship buried in Norway. And a recent analysis of a wood sample reveals that although the ship looks well-preserved, it‚Äôs actually being eaten away by fungus. 

Time for a rescue mission. https://t.co/jlO2cbO8Qp
